com.myronmarston.music
Class AudioFileCreator

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.AudioFileCreator

public class AudioFileCreator
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to create audio files, such as WAV files and mp3's. It uses the Gervill, Tritonus and LAME open source projects.

Field Summary
static javax.sound.midi.Soundbank SOUNDBANK
          The Midi sound bank used to generate the audio files.

Parameters:
wavFileName - the file name to save to
Throws:
